definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin
guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] (a type of zither)/musical instrument in general

sentences.english: Quartet for Flute, Oboe, Cello and Harpsichord.
sentences.chinese: 長笛四重奏，雙簧管，大提琴和大鍵琴。

sentences.english: The structure of a harpsichord, which was an early piano, was hard to comprehend.
sentences.chinese: 大鍵琴是早期的鋼琴，它的構造不易理解。
